title: Understanding Arithmetic Operations in Excel
text: Excel uses standard arithmetic operators to perform calculations. These operators are similar to those used in basic mathematics.

title: List of Arithmetic Operators
text: The primary arithmetic operators used in Excel include addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, exponentiation, and percentage.

title: Identify the Symbols for Each Operation
text: What are the symbols used for addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, exponentiation, and percentage in Excel?

title: Addition and Subtraction
text: In Excel, addition is represented by the $$'+'$$ symbol, and subtraction is represented by the '-' symbol.

title: Multiplication and Division
text: Multiplication is represented by the $$' '$$ symbol, and division is represented by the $$\frac{'}{'}$$ symbol in Excel.

title: Exponentiation and Percentage
text: Exponentiation is represented by the $${'}^{'}$$ symbol, and percentage is represented by the '%' symbol in Excel.
